title: Commissioner Snow Hearing
description: Hearing before Commissioner Snow confirming house must be listed and sold with all cooperation from both parties. Deadline for sale set on or before Nov 17 2025.

title: Photo Session Canceled
description: Initial photo session canceled by Lisa citing unprepared master bedroom and cluttered spaces.

title: Lisa Refuses Professional Yard Work
description: Lisa declines professional yard work offer arranged by realtor despite fair pricing and agreement to split costs.

title: Realtor Feedback: Pet Odor and Clutter
description: Buyers report overwhelming pet odor and excessive clutter during first showings; multiple groups leave early due to smell.

title: Realtor Recommendation Letter
description: Jeff issues formal recommendations: remove items from horizontal surfaces, reduce furniture by 50%, deep clean carpets, and address pet smell.

title: Listing Temporarily Withdrawn
description: Realtor advises temporary withdrawal of listing to allow deep cleaning and decluttering before re-listing.

title: Lisa Reports Cleaning Progress
description: Lisa reports floors mopped, carpets re-cleaned, family helping with decluttering; promises house ready by Sunday (Oct 19).

title: Tom Requests Photo Verification
description: Tom asks Lisa to send photos verifying cleaning and yard work completion to confirm readiness for relisting.

title: Lisa Confirms Readiness for Sunday
description: Lisa reiterates house will be ready by Sunday (Oct 19) per realtor’s recommendations.

title: Tom Requests Photo Proof Again
description: Tom sends polite second request for photo evidence of completed cleaning, yard work, and furniture reduction.

title: Lisa Delays Realtor Walkthrough
description: Lisa defers Jeff’s walkthrough to after 5 p.m. Sunday, forcing reschedule.

title: Realtor Reschedules Walkthrough
description: Jeff proposes new walkthrough for Oct 21 at 3 p.m. to inspect cleaning progress and confirm listing readiness.

title: Realtor Plans Independent Verification
description: Jeff informs Tom he will bring another agent to corroborate findings and document odors independently.

title: Tenant Access Concern
description: Tom reports basement tenant appeared upset and was seeking Lisa during house preparations, possibly affecting access.

title: Realtor Acknowledges Tenant Issue
description: Jeff confirms tenant cooperation is essential and acknowledges it could affect potential buyers.

title: Realtor Verification Walkthrough
description: Jeff and second agent scheduled walkthrough to verify cleaning, odor remediation, and photo readiness.
